StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCandidateOccrForPerson]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@PersonID int)
AS
SELECT [MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] AS ID ,[MOS_CODE] AS MosCode ,[STATE_CODE] AS StateCode ,[COUNTY_CODE] AS CountyCode ,[CITY_CODE] AS CityCode ,[PRIORITY_PREF] AS PriorityPref FROM [dbo].[CANDIDATE_OCCR] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @PersonID
